lead_paragraph: SMILEY--Eleanor Lewit, 88 years old, passed away on May 25, 2016 from the long term effects of Alzheimer's and a more recent stroke. Devoted wife of Jerome. Beloved and loving mother of Gail Smiley Heppen, and Wendy, Amy, and Tammy Smiley. Cherished grandmother, great-grandmother, aunt, cousin, and friend to many. May she find the peace that a deserving soul is entitled to find. Services Sunday 11:00am at the Reconstructionist Synagogue of the North Shore, Plandome, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SMILEY, ELEANOR LEWIT
